title: Jean-Claude Ruiz
text: Jean-Claude Ruiz (born 30 November 1954) is a French <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201976%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20welterweight">men's light welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1976%20Summer%20Olympics">1976 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1976 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Calistrat%20Cu%C8%9Bov">Calistrat Cuțov</a> of Romania.
